system.description:
Shadow-veiled alchemical apothecaries, compassionate herbalist healers, or beakmasked disease cultists who can perform surgeries and harness the power of science.

Weapons: Censer flail, stiletto, rapier, needle whip, dart

Armor: Leather armor

Hit Points: 1d6 per level

Languages. You know 2 additional common languages.

Mask Infusion. Inhale one premade herbal elixir from your mask for prevention or cure. Lasts all day, expires on use.

Mesmirize Insect. 1/day, you bewitch an insect to automatically deliver an injure elixir to a target within near.

Elixirs. You can craft elixirs by making an INT check. Apply the modifier for the chosen delivery method(See @UUID[Compendium.unnatural-selection.documents.JournalEntry.4G9LZfiREUuQViCf.JournalEntryPage.pner3NgfU4oKKvjT]{Delivery Method} table) to this check. This does not take your action.

If you fail, you can’t make that elixir again until you rest. Except for mask infusions, elixirs expire in 5 rounds.

Critical success increases DC or die category by one or doubles duration. Critical fails self-inflict harmful elixirs.

You can use the table on pg. 27 of Cursed Scroll #2 to craft more elixirs. These poisons require a DC 14 INT check. Refer to the “use” column for the delivery method modifier.
